definitions.definition: A loose shirt , usually made of a knit fleece , for athletic wear and now often used as casual apparel.
A shirt worn against the skin , usually under other clothing , to absorb sweat .

main_definition: A loose shirt , usually made of a knit fleece , for athletic wear and now often used as casual apparel.
secondary_definitions: A shirt worn against the skin , usually under other clothing , to absorb sweat .
